name: Proxy
description: A Proxy utilizing the Unstructured Storage pattern.

functionDecorators.name: _setAndInitializeImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Sets the address of the implementation contract and calls into it. Throws if the initialization callback fails.If the target contract does not need initialization, use setImplementation instead.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new target contract.

parameterDecorators.name: callbackData
parameterDecorators.description: The abi-encoded function call to perform in the implementation contract.

functionDecorators.name: _setImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Sets the address of the implementation contract. If the target contract needs to be initialized, call setAndInitializeImplementation instead.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new target contract.

functionDecorators.name: _transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of Proxy to a new owner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new owner account.
